DOC.detailed_description: Phase IV , prospective , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , academically fund clinical trial , 6 month follow-up . A total 354 patient recruit . Inclusion criterion : 1 ) successful surgical percutaneous repair cardiac valve least one year screen 2 ) persistent moderate severe PH , 3 ) absence residual significant valvular lesion . Patients randomize 1:1 receive sildenafil 40 mg t.i.d . placebo . The primary endpoint clinical composite score combining : all-cause mortality , hospital admission heart failure , World Health Organization ( WHO ) functional class , patient global assessment score . Additional clinical mechanistic secondary end-points define .
